logos.description: stylized graphic of a cluster of red roses with green leaves, accented by a red splash/splatter effect and subtle black outlining.

logoFingerprint.notes: The exact same embroidered graphic is present on the right upper thigh of both the black and white versions of the track pants. The embroidery shows clear thread definition and a raised texture typical of direct embroidery, not a patch or print.

modelPose: Dynamic stance showing full leg length, both colorways visible in composite or alternating
setting: Candlelit baroque ballroom, crystal chandeliers, dramatic blood-red shadows
